siteMetadata.title: 国外股市热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览国外股票社区里的热门讨论

blogPost.title: Israel has now fully vaccinated 90% of its population aged 70 and above. Covid-19 deaths are down 77% from their peak and will continue to plummet in the coming weeks, giving the world a glimpse at what the future looks like with herd immunity and the most vulnerable protected. https://t.co/AdSTYTpzMn
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 以色列现在已经为其90％的70岁及以上人口全面接种了疫苗。Covid-19的死亡人数比高峰期下降了77%，并将在未来几周内继续大幅下降，这让世界看到了群体免疫和最脆弱群体得到保护的未来。https://t.co/AdSTYTpzMn。
以色列現在已經爲其90％的70歲及以上人口全面接種了疫苗。Covid-19的死亡人數比高峯期下降了77%，並將在未來幾周內繼續大幅下降，這讓世界看到了羣體免疫和最脆弱羣體得到保護的未來。https://t.co/AdSTYTpzMn。

previous.title: An update on /u/LAMPZWORLDWG22 ( The guy who borrowed money from a drug dealer for GME, and then asked Reddit how to get a refund because the stock went down) but this time on his new account lol.
